title: Dave Wasserman: Gerrymandering & 2018 House predictions
description: Dave Wasserman, House Editor for the Cook Political Report, joins Chuck Todd to handicap the biggest House races in the 2018 midterm, and to discuss the future of district reapportionment.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
